query.name: findByPKAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT SED.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SED, study st WHERE SED.study_event_definition_id = ? AND SED.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findByOidAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT SED.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SED, study st WHERE SED.oc_oid = ? AND SED.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findByOid
query.sql: SELECT SED.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SED WHERE SED.oc_oid = ?

query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE sed.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) order by sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllActiveByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE sed.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND sed.status_id=1 order by sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllByStudyAndLimit
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE sed.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) and rownum <= 5 order by sed.date_updated desc

query.name: findNextKey
query.sql: select study_event_definition_id_seq.nextval as key from dual

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION (study_event_definition_id,STUDY_ID, NAME,DESCRIPTION, REPEATING, "TYPE", CATEGORY, OWNER_ID,STATUS_ID,DATE_CREATED, ordinal,oc_oid) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SET STUDY_ID=?,NAME=?, DESCRIPTION=?,REPEATING=?,TYPE=?,CATEGORY=?,STATUS_ID=?, DATE_UPDATED=sysdate,UPDATE_ID=?, ordinal=? WHERE STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?

query.name: findAllWithStudyEvent
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT D.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION D , STUDY_EVENT E , study st WHERE D.study_event_definition_id = E.study_event_definition_id AND D.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findAllByCrf
query.sql: select distinct sed.* from study_event_definition sed, event_definition_crf edc where sed.study_event_definition_id = edc.study_event_definition_id and edc.crf_id = ?

query.name: findByEventDefinitionCRFId
query.sql: SELECT D.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION D, EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF E WHERE D.study_event_definition_id = E.study_event_definition_id AND E.event_definition_crf_id = ?

query.name: findAllActiveByParentStudyId
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE sed.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=?) AND sed.status_id=1 order by sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findByStudySubject
query.sql: select * from study_event_definition where study_event_definition_id in ( select distinct study_event_definition_id from study_event where study_subject_id = ?)

query.name: buildMaxOrdinalByStudyEvent
query.sql: select max(sample_ordinal) as max_ord, study_event_definition_id from study_event group by study_event_definition_id, study_subject_id having study_subject_id = ?
